column2: Job Title: Ecommerce Expert (Amazon & Ebay)  Location: Pune Job Type: Full Time, Permanent Work Shift: UK Shift Salary 8lpa  12lpa Based in central Bradford, we are a leading manufacturer of innovative own brand, products designed to challenge the market. With over 25 years in the business, we now have four dedicated office spaces including a production office in China and support in India. Now, we are gearing up to shake the electronic and health, and beauty industries to their core with the introduction of two new brands and a multitude of different and exciting products, and that is just the beginning. About the role: We are innovative, driven, and fearless. If you are a confident, ambitious Ecommerce Expert this could be the next step in your career. Key Duties:   You will be responsible for managing and optimizing our presence on these e-commerce platforms to maximize sales, visibility, and customer satisfaction.  Responsible to build, optimize the market & manage the full site.  Work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and implement strategies that enhance our product listings, improve search rankings, and drive overall performance on Amazon and eBay.  Oversee the day-to-day operations on Amazon and eBay, ensuring product listings are accurate, up-to-date, and optimized for search.  Manage inventory levels, pricing, and promotions to maximize sales and profitability.  Monitor competitor activity and market trends to identify opportunities and threats.  Develop and implement strategies to optimize product listings, including keyword research, compelling product descriptions, and high-quality images.  Analyze key performance metrics on Amazon and eBay, such as sales, conversion rates, and customer reviews.  Prepare regular reports and insights to track progress and identify areas for improvement.  Collaborate with customer service teams to address customer inquiries, feedback, and reviews on Amazon and eBay.  Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction and resolve any issues promptly.  Stay informed about and adhere to Amazon and eBay policies, ensuring all product listings comply with guidelines.  Proactively address any issues related to policy violations. About you:   Proven experience as an Amazon and eBay Expert or in a similar e-commerce role.  Should have experience with Shopify shop within ebay & amazon.  In-depth knowledge of Amazon and eBay platforms, policies, and best practices.  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make strategic recommendations.  Excellent communication and collaboration skills.  Familiarity with other e-commerce platforms.
column11: Promotions, inventory, Amazon, ecommerce platform, Performance Metrics, rankings, Ebay

column2: A Sell side (Merch) role at Flipkart entails category management based on deep customer centricity, strong analytics, sharp planning and story-telling coupled with product/tech understanding for an enhanced customer experience. It requires attention to detail, zero compromise on customer experience & end to end ownership of tasks with non-stop creativity to make Flipkart the most preferred online shopping destination. Job Description - Customer understanding Be the voice of the customer internally. There are multiple avenues through which customers interact with Flipkart - Creatives (Flipkart app store, Category Stoes, Brand stores), product pages, CX team, Offers & more. This role requires owning every aspect of customer interaction & working towards making it better.  Merchandising execution Develop and execute plans to showcase the right products & communicate right features, price at all platforms using internal tools Take complete ownership of validating the task before making it live on the platform Own the customer experience in the category - make navigation, discovery easier to save the customer time & ease up the decision making process Identify the parameters customers use to make decisions and ensure catalog richness Interact with stakeholders effectively & ensure category tasks are executed to the best In case of technical issues, debug the issue in Flipkart tools, interact with central teams & solve it Train fellow colleagues when required Traffic Generation Increase organic traffic by effective targeting to desired customers in order to increase conversion for the category. Understand the product capability on the platform that will enable to perform these actions and plan effectively for it basis performance Focus on increasing clicks on the category merchandise by improving callouts, images, offers etc.  Desired skills Desire and ability to think like the customer, Ability to translate strategies into execution plans and take them to completion, Quick learner of softwares/IT tools Highly analytical, ability to understand and report traffic trends with a basic understanding of the reasons behind the observed trends Excellent verbal and written communication with interpersonal skills, Strong understanding of technology and business, Willingness to learn & go beyond the defined role to benefit the business Ability to connect with people across teams & levels, ability to get things done on time Strong bias for Action - Flipkart works at a very rapid pace Required Experience Min Qualification: Graduate/Diploma in Technical course , BE , B-Tech with experience in E-Commerce/ Tech companies/ retail sector Skills Required: Proficient in Excel, Google sheets , Clear communication

column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive E-commerce Operations Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of e-commerce operations, including catalog management, delivery management, inventory management, and customer service. The E-commerce Operations Executive will play a crucial role in ensuring smooth and efficient operations, optimizing processes, and enhancing the overall customer experience. Responsibilities: Catalog Management: Create and maintain product listings on the e-commerce platform, ensuring accuracy and completeness of product information, images, and pricing. Coordinate with suppliers and vendors to obtain product data and updates. Regularly audit and optimize product categories and attributes for improved searchability and navigation. Delivery Management: Coordinate with logistics partners to ensure timely and accurate delivery of orders. Monitor delivery performance and address any issues or delays promptly. Implement and optimize delivery processes to enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Inventory Management: Monitor inventory levels and coordinate with suppliers to ensure adequate stock availability. Implement inventory control measures to minimize stockouts and overstock situations. Conduct regular inventory audits and reconcile discrepancies. Customer Service: Respond to customer inquiries and resolve issues related to orders, deliveries, and product information. Collaborate with the customer service team to ensure prompt and satisfactory resolution of customer issues. Identify areas for improvement in customer service processes and implement solutions. Data Analysis and Reporting: Analyze e-commerce performance metrics, including sales, conversion rates, and customer satisfaction, to identify trends and opportunities for improvement. Generate reports and dashboards to provide insights into operational performance and inform decision-making. Process Optimization: Continuously evaluate e-commerce operations processes and workflows to identify inefficiencies and areas for improvement. Implement process improvements and automation initiatives to streamline operations and enhance productivity. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, e-commerce, or related field. Proven experience in e-commerce operations, preferably in a similar role. Strong understanding of e-commerce platforms and technologies. Excellent organizational and multitasking skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines. Benefits: Competitive salary Health insurance Paid time off Opportunities for professional development and advancement

column2: Job Description for E-commerce Specialist E-commerce positions help complete tasks necessary for the buying and selling of products and services on the internet. As more brands and businesses use the internet to market, sell and promote their offerings, these types of positions may continue to grow in demand. An e-commerce expert is a professional who specializes in developing online sales strategies. They promote the services and products of the organization they work for and provide their services to multiple clients. Responsibilities: Maintain product content that will be published on our e-Commerce Shopify website. Maintain best practices for new product listings, content creation, distribution, and maintenance. Create and execute a system for matching suppliers' warehouse product information listings with the e-commerce sites. Provide support in other areas of e-commerce marketing, SEO, Google Ads, Google Analytics, website UX, and Social Media. Work on existing product listings and launch new product listings on the company's various e-commerce platforms by collaborating and effectively communicating with departments such as Purchasing, Marketing, Receiving, Compliance Department, etc. Research new product information, including brands and features, and photos, to create content for product pages. Manages product information on e-commerce platforms; develops enhanced product pages. Translates business requirements into the appropriate product data structure. Collaborates with business resources or product manufacturers to obtain and format product information, content, and media. Resizes, formats, and processes product images. Maintains products catalog in the warehouse management system. Updates product images and information through the life cycle of the product. Educates other team members on new product information and New process information. Maintains up-to-date awareness and knowledge of company products Perform other duties as assigned by the Product Development Manager. Requirements: Ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Ability to learn quickly and flexibility to adapt to changes in processes. Ability to multitask and work on several projects simultaneously. Proven work experience with more than 5 years as Ecommerce Specialist Excellent written and oral communication skills. Photoshop Knowledge is a plus Technical Capacity. Excellent attention to detail and time management skills.

Language proficiency required: English, Hindi, Regional language (preferred only for regional language LOBs) Position Summary: Lead a team of Team Leads/AMs to ensure meeting process SLAs and assist Process Head to run process smoothly ***Prior Experience in Ecommerce preferred*** Roles and Responsibilities Provide      meaningful reporting to Senior Management in a timely and effective manner Plan      and implement different strategies for ensuring profitability of the      account Handle      client interaction and escalations (on calls or in person) Conduct      regular reviews with AMs and other departments to ensure adherence to      process deliverables (SLAs) Closely      monitoring daily productivity against the defined Service Level standards Perform      regular audit checks on client defined compliance requirements Coach      & monitor Team leads/AMs in day to day operations &      people handling Develop      a continuous learning process for the team Supervise      and support team members to ensure that delivery is consistent with or      exceeds client's quality service standards Represent      the organization and participate in client visits and reviews. Key Deliverables (KRA Measure) Meet      targets on different internal and external KPIs Ensure      that client escalations are NIL Review      AM performance on a daily/weekly/monthly basis Look      after employee engagement and ensure that ESAT for the process is good Ensure      the process operates at/above profitable thresholds   Applicants   Specifications & Qualification: Excellent      verbal and written communication (English) in an international process Candidate      must be college or vocational school graduates or possess comparable work      experience Ability      to prepare and present PowerPoint Presentations Knowledge      of operational process, logical thinking, reporting and analysis Ability      to handle pressure Ability      to follow instructions and client requirements within TAT and with      accuracy Open      to change, Multi-tasking skills Shows      flexibility/ownership & works under pressure situation Ability      to work within challenging environment with tight delivery timelines Open      to work in rotational and night shifts
column11: Customer Service, CSAT, Operations, Customer Management, Operations Management

Conducting regular audits of product listings and ensuring any errors or discrepancies are resolved promptly.     Collaborating with the sales and marketing teams to ensure products are promoted effectively.     Keeping up-to-date with the latest e-commerce trends and ensuring that our product listings are in line with best practices.     Managing product images and ensuring they are of high quality.     Generating reports and analyzing data to identify opportunities for improvement.     Working with third-party vendors to obtain and upload product information as needed.     Developing and maintaining relationships with key e-commerce platform representatives.

column2: Interested Candidates share your updated resume at juhirana@ocubeservices.com    or WhatsApp at 8448301617 Looking Only From E-commerce Platform  Job Responsibilities  Product Listing and Management:  Create and update product listings, ensuring accurate and compelling product descriptions, images, and pricing.  Monitor inventory levels and coordinate restocking efforts to meet customer demand.  Implement pricing strategies to maximize sales and profitability. Customer Communication:  Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries, concerns, and feedback.  Provide product information, resolve issues, and facilitate returns or exchanges as needed.  Maintain a positive and helpful attitude while assisting customers through various communication channels. Order Processing and Fulfillment:  Process customer orders, ensuring accurate order details and timely fulfillment.  Collaborate with warehouse and shipping teams to ensure orders are packed and shipped accurately and on schedule. Data Analysis and Reporting:  Analyze marketplace performance metrics to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges.  Generate regular reports to track sales, inventory levels, customer feedback, and other relevant KPIs. Marketplace Optimization:  Identify opportunities to enhance the customer shopping experience and increase conversion rates.  Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to implement promotions, campaigns, and cross-selling initiatives. Quality Assurance:  Conduct regular quality checks on product listings, ensuring accurate information and consistent branding.  Monitor customer reviews and ratings, addressing any issues to maintain a positive reputation. Market Research:  Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to make informed recommendations. Work Hours and Shifts  You would work for 6 days a week.  Rotational Shift
column11: Market Place, Graphics, PMO, Website Management, Listing, E-commerce, Product Listing, Graphic Designing, Design Skills

column2: Key Responsibilities:  Ecom Operations Manage operations across online/ QC platforms (Amazon, FK, Jiomart, Big Basket, Blinkit, Zepto etc) Listing & Cataloguing  Inventory Management Managing FBA Shipments etc Supply Chain Management Coordinate with suppliers, vendors, third-party manufacturers, warehouse, and logistics partners to ensure a smooth flow of materials, inventory management, and timely deliveries. Sourcing and developing vendors when needed and coordinating with existing vendors Keep track of RM & PM inventory and FG stock levels Resolve any order-related disputes (stock-outs, wrong item received, not received, damaged, etc Analytics & Reporting Generate and analyze reports on key performance metrics related to sales, advertisements, etc. Prepare order reconciliation reports matching with receivables and inventory. Others Assist in organizing and participating in events and exhibitions Provide company-wide support when required. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelors degree is a must. Experience of 2-3 years in E-commerce and quick commerce, preferably for a packaged food company Strong understanding of E-commerce platforms & quick commerce operations Proficiency in data analysis and ability to draw insights from analytics tools. Willingness to travel and wear multiple hats as and when required

column2: Operations Manager: Male Candidate Mandate Skills:- People Management. Process Development Should have exp in Warehouse End to End Operation- First Mile, Mid Mile and Last Mile. Job Description : Customer Experience : Ensure adherence to the Service Level Agreements of order management Work towards continuous improvement for serving all customers within the stated service delivery times across the city. Liaison with customer relationship team to ensure seamless customer experience Manpower Management : Manage the on boarding and training activities for TLs and Delivery Executives and ensure that they follow the required guidelines while performing different tasks. Ensure prompt responses to queries /concerns raised by the TLs and Delivery Executives thereby clearing doubts/ apprehensions if any Monitor the performance metrics of different reporting teams and take necessary actions to improve the same. Process and compliance : Help build and implement SOPs. Manage workflow and day to day operations Execute plans for ensuring availability of adequate fleet and/or building the fleet and infrastructure to meet the Supply demand Strategize and Execute central initiatives as well as contribute with ideas for effectively scaling up the operations Explore opportunities for reducing the overall Cost per Delivery. Reports: Generating & maintaining order report, inventory management, tracking reports, vendor management, WH in/out report etc. Special Projects - Manage/ Contribute to Special projects such as launching new cities, building new supply chain etc.    Job Title:  Operations Manager: Location: Bangalore Work Type: work form office( Monday to Saturday)
column11: Operations Management, Process Management, People Management

column2: As a Global Account Manager , the Purpose of the Job is that of a thread that helps converge all critical Functions within Payments for synergized complete Ecosystem creation offerings, faster Turnarounds and more strategic and monitored Actionable / Objectives that are reviewable with time lines across converged approaches largely on Acquiring, Issuance, IFB & Banking. Also Help the Payment Solutions Business Functions to leverage strengths of other Inter Bank Businesses viz (WBG, RBB, Auto etc) both on the consumer & wholesale side. This role also is created to identify, analyze & plan actionables resulting in Work streams to ring fence the critical/Too important to loose accounts. This role should also lead to ideation and execution of Best Practices, Process redesign, keeping the End customer experience in Mind, that gets reflected in the wallet share of the Payment Solutions Products and also of the Bank, leveraged using Payments relationship  EXPERIENCE : 10-12 years of experience in Fintech & payment gateway is mandatory
column11: Fintech, Payment Gateways, Payments, Payment Domain

column1: Senior Specialist Category Management BU Outdoor - Emerging Markets
column2: As Senior Specialist Category Management Outdoor you will drive category business success through supporting the Emerging Markets Business Unit with all Category Management related tasks.      You will support the implementation of global Concepts-to-Consumer strategies in a locally relevant way for Emerging Markets, considering different consumer needs and distribution channel requirements within Emerging Markets Clusters.      Collaborate regularly with EM cluster/country organizations & global stakeholders to support execution and to identify business opportunities in the market to maximize net sales and profitability.          Key Responsibilities:        Support the Emerging Markets Senior Manager Outdoor with all range management tasks within the parameters set by the EM Range Architecture team.      Drive category management for assigned category across all KPIs, with the objective to maximize business opportunities.      Execute the seasonal Go-To-Market process and calendar milestones for Emerging Markets.      Support Emerging Markets Common Range and exclusive strategies, considering different consumer- and distribution channels requirements.      Support the cross-functional EM alignment across all Brand and Support functions stakeholders.      Facilitate efficient communication with respective Cluster stakeholders, to enable executional excellence as well as driving upwards communication to Global stakeholders.      Support BU data analysis and category tracking (eg, BOH Reports, Campaign Tracking, Sell-Through Reports).      Initiate EM product projects and successfully initiate them with global Outdoor team.      Act as single point of contact (SPOC) for system related tasks, including Article Master Data maintenance in RMA, maintaining the Ranging Management Tool, and other relevant systems (eg, M-3, DART, BI etc).      Responsible for leading all BU ranging activities in RMA, adhering to seasonal RMA timelines set by the MOPS Team.      Support the BU with M-3 Range Tool (Range board creation, sample order placement, etc).      Support BU requirements with regards to sell-in tool creation, milestone meeting preparations and coordination.      Understand the EM consumer and retail environment including distribution channels, competitors and pricing strategies.        KPIs:          EM Net Sales, Category growth, Business segment growth      EM Category Range optimization based on range architecture guidance.      EM Common Range implementation and sell-out rate.      Executional excellence across seasonal Go-To-Market Milestones.      Executional excellence in system and data maintenance.          Key Relationships:        EM Business Unit Running, Credibility Sports & Outdoor Team      EM Horizontal Brand Teams (Concept-to-Consumer, Marketing Operations, Brand Activation)      EM Business Units (Football, Originals, Sportswear & Training)      EM Cluster/Country Category Management / Concept-to-consumer teams      EM Channel, Finance, Demand Planning      Global Business Unit Outdoor Knowledge,        Skills and Abilities:        Strong analytical skills and attention to detail      Collaborative with strong communication skills      Structured, organized and process oriented.      Intermediate to advanced skills in MS Office      Respectful Team player      Experience in Category Management and Merchandising are an advantage      Passion for sport and fashion      Ability to work on own initiative and adhere to timelines      Ability to make fact-based decisions        Requisite Education and Experience / Minimum Qualifications:          University Degree in Business or Marketing      Minimum 2 years of Category Management/ Ranging/ Merchandising- or Account Marketing / Sales Experience      Advanced user of Excel and PowerPoint      Fluent in English (verbal and written)                COURAGE:    Speak up when you see an opportunity; step up when you see a need..            OWNERSHIP:    Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through.            INNOVATION:    Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things.            TEAMPLAY:    Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset.            INTEGRITY:    Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company s standards.            RESPECT:    Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all
column11: Analytical skills, Data analysis, Sales, Demand planning, Brand activation, consumer marketing, Category management, Marketing operations, MS Office, Merchandising

column2: Kindly note this position is for AHMEDABAD, ANDHRA PRADESH & UTTAR PRADESH  Key Purpose of the Role  :  Implement Rural Aggregation Program Location: UP/AP/Ahmedabad Role & responsibilities:   Rural Aggregation Program: Implement Standard Operating Process for Rural Aggregation business with local rural network partner.  Plan operations for Rural aggregation including procurement prices/ operating costs.  Onboarding support for subscribers, and service providers for the rural network partner  Plan and execute local seasonal procurement in coordination with field sales and marketing. Scheduling, Delivery, Settlement, and Warehousing activity support to Rural Network partnering coordination with Platform Operations.   Operations planning and execution for rural biomass aggregation business  Preferred candidate profile: Agri Tech / Farm Sector product company  Ability to create and manage relationships  Ability to do concept sales, Exposure to dealing with Farmers / FPOs/ other rural business entities  Willingness to travel Education:  Graduate / PG in Agri Sciences You can share your resume at - work@biofuelcircle.com

column2: The Promotion Analyst supports the Buying Team by creating/ maintaining pricing promotional offers for Stores/ E     com business during any seasonal events     The Promotion analyst role is to create offers accurately as per the info provided by the buyers/ vendors, liaise with PLU team to resolve any pre-scan issues live issues     The position requires frequent communication with buying team as well as with vendors, PLU AMS team           Who You Are:       ?     University or college degree or commensurate retail experience   Preferred 1-2 years related experience in a merchandise/ Price Promotion capability   Excellent computer skills including MS Word and Excel Google Suites   Team player   Sense of urgency flexibility ability to multitask   Detail oriented and Willingness to learn   Willing to work in flexible shifts timings/ weekends     ?       What you will do as the Promotion Analyst:       ?     Update Non-Ad files up-to-date accurately creates support/ Clarification document if necessary   Create flip clarification if necessary   Create manage Product groups, execute Marketing downloads while maintaining and understanding of the timelines to ensure accurate execution and review is complete before due date   Solve Pre-Scan and Live PLU issues within the desired timelines   Populate and maintain internal documents (SxS) with historical and actual promotional results accordingly   Work closely with PLU signing team to provide and populate required information   Create NSP after lockout(marketing additions, deletions, multi-level, price change)     ?   Job Qualifications        ?       What you will need:       ?     Retail knowledge/ relevant experience   Excellent in communication skills   Problem Solving Ability     ?       Good to haves:       ?     Analytical Skills   Pricing Promotion domain expertise   Knowledge on Excel G-Suite     ?       What You Can Expect:       ?     Competitive salary and benefits package   Flexible work environment that allows for work-life balance
